creator: alko@nc.rr.com
text:
<target name="f2">
    <copy file="test.txt" tofile="sample.test.txt" overwrite="false"
failonerror="true" verbose="true" />
</target>

If sample.test.txt exists, it will be overwritten if test.txt is newer.

This is exactly what overwrite is meant to do. 

Copy has two modes
-copy only if source file is newer than the dest (overwrite=false)
-copy even if dest file is newer than the source (overwrite=true)

What you seem to want is 'overwrite only if the dest file doesnt exist'. To do
that, use a <selector> in the fileset to only copy files that dont exist at the
destination.
creator: stevel@apache.org
